title: Su-asa
author: Su-asa
content: sourceMy people una good day SIRs/MAs, I come with another tory about DANGOTE cement price for this our country, and the real matter be say government and the owner of this cement company done join heads together say by the 1st of October 2023 (next month) the price of cement go reduce from N5500 to N2700 per bag.As we all know say for this country now, e dey hard for both the young and old to build houses because of the way cement take cost and the economy self no dey better in anyway. Apart from politicians and other oil company workers I no see any other person way go buy cement way no go complain even if say na small.But as government done promise us say cement price go come down, na e be say nah to just dey look if them go fit do as they talk am.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Did you read what is on the link that you posted? It says otherwise. What did you expect Nigerians to speculate after this news? BUA Moves To Crash Cement Price To N3,500 After Meeting TinubuThat led to the rumour. If the power plants are completed and BOA reduces cement price, likely Dangote cement might reduce in price, but there is nothing like that for now.Quote from: https://www.legit.ng/business-economy/money/1555478-dangote-speaks-plans-slash-cement-price-n5500-n2700-october-1/Speaking with Legit.ng exclusively, Anthony Chiejina, the Group Chief Branding and Communications Officer of Dangote Industries Limited, described the reports as fake news.

comments.author: Forever101
comments.body: Na better talk be that if e go come true, but make I yarn you say, if cement turn 750 naira some people go still get reason wey Dem no go fit buy or build house. Some problem wey we get with many people , na issue of their mindset. When things no hard for this country, many person no stibfit build house. Me I believe say this one fit help stabilize the economy small but say e go help people fit build house na just dream. Who go build go build and who no go build no go still build if cement na free, Dem go still complain about labour money.

comments.author: AYOBA
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on September 25, 2023, 11:04:10 AMMy people una good day SIRs/MAs, I come with another tory about DANGOTE cement price for this our country, and the real matter be say government and the owner of this cement company done join heads together say by the 1st of October 2023 (next month) the price of cement go reduce from N5500 to N2700 per bag.This news you drop here may be rumor. Because I didn't anticipate that the cost of a bag of cement would drop to N2700, in the situation we are in now, and even though Alinko Dangote's sincere desire to do so for our nation, they will persuade him to keep cement prices high. Can you imagine that in KOTONU, what they are selling bags of cement for them is different from what they're selling for us here, and we are the ones that even produce for them.QuoteBut as government done promise us say cement price go come down, na e be say nah to just dey look if them go fit do as they talk am. As you said that the government promised us, it's like you forget if not, you won't repeat that same promise. How often has the government made promises that you would go accomplish things but weren't able to? Not all Nigerians rely solely on decisions made by the government now oo my brother.

Apart from politicians and other oil company workers I no see any other person way go buy cement way no go complain even if say na small.But as government done promise us say cement price go come down, na e be say nah to just dey look if them go fit do as they talk am. As you take see this news did you believe that e fit happen so? my brother this county don tired everybody make u sef reason am say this kind thing no fit happen for this country wey we dey so, fuel price never come down how cement money go take come down, if fuel prices increase e dey touch the price of everything in this this country. As this economy dey so no be everybody go complain about am some people go just dey follow people talk ni just for people to be like they are also feeling it, money dey where e dey and money dey this our country as you dey see am so just for the people wey no get make them talk say them no get. Rich man go dey follow people dey complain and they will still be buying the same product they are complaining that the price is going up.Even though cement price kept on increasing every day me I have 100% sure say people go still dey buy am and they won't know that they remove money from their pocket, we say price they increase and rich people still dey build houses, big mansions and we say economy hard. I believe say this country fit better make the prices come down but that still be under probability because no be waiting governments dey promise us we dey later see.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: All of us they fine way how things wan carry better for the country, how goods price go carry reduce and how we fit take better our live for this wi country, but that one no mean say we no go calm down read news and we go just they conclude for anything way we read online when we never even confirm the source if the information nah truth or not. Cement price use style carry rush go up, and for am to just move down from 5500 to 3000 or 3500 for just matter for months no really they possible like that for diz kind country way we they way get unfavorable policy for consumers, so that one alone without us self to go run further investigation suppose tell us say the story nah rumors. Even as the talk come out from the head of the group for company way they inside cement manufacturing matter if I never see work in action I no they believe them, we just need to they observe them see how far, nah diz kind small small news we been they hear say if dangote finish refinery day fuel price go low for the country (how far now). All this things way this business men dem they do nah just formality those entrepreneurs no be any different from the politicians way they campaign to enter office, dem they use sweet talk buy your heart but for the end dem go do Watin they Favour them no be ur progress be their problem. Watin dem just want nah make dem buy favor from the government and us way be citizen make we suport them dat is if dem even need the suport, so that dem fit build anything way go make dem get enough money and product to sell pass Watin dem they sell now, make dem hand over every thing to them make eh they their care with believe say for their hand cement price go better. Even till the next year make we no surprise say the price still even still worst pass Watin eh they now , I no the wish for am to bad, but nah just country way me and u dy inside, things price dy easily go up but for am to come down eh they hard. Make we bring our hope down, diz one nah just normal yanning way dem just yan.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Nah really "them don tok anoda one" be dis becos nah only for naija wey something go happen today, tomoro you wake up hear say nah lie. And even if you get evidence, Dem fit still deny am. Well, e fit be say wetin @CharlseTim tok say na just news outlets trying to create trend becos for this   news, spokesperson for Dangote Group, Anthony Chiejine don come out tok say nah lie lie news. How I see this news nah just a means to put am on the news unto say him go soon open him refinery from next month so news outlets wan like make am trend somehow.Seriously, even if the price of cement dey slashed, e no go be much of a welcome development pass wen we hear say him (Dangote) dey open refinery. Because oda competitors fit reduce their price, but no be all of them get refinery. Cement reduction (if e dey happen) go solve very small problem for naija compared refinery own becos prices of things don go up all say fuel scarcity dey hit.

comments.author: Abdulzuruku01
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on September 25, 2023, 11:04:10 AMsourceMy people una good day SIRs/MAs, I come with another tory about DANGOTE cement price for this our country, and the real matter be say government and the owner of this cement company done join heads together say by the 1st of October 2023 (next month) the price of cement go reduce from N5500 to N2700 per bag.As we all know say for this country now, e dey hard for both the young and old to build houses because of the way cement take cost and the economy self no dey better in anyway. Apart from politicians and other oil company workers I no see any other person way go buy cement way no go complain even if say na small.But as government done promise us say cement price go come down, na e be say nah to just dey look if them go fit do as they talk am. I understand that you can't just obviously  post false information here; rather, you were genuinely excited about it because it will make the public happy. However, you should always seek out a good confirmation from a trustworthy source like vanguard, the guardian and leadership e.t.c before posting anything. Even if Dangote decides to lower the price of cement to 2700 naira, it will be very difficult for him to do so because of the percentages he must give to the Nigerian government and our traditional leaders. Reducing that price today is going to have an impact on the percentage of money donated to our Nigerian government. We are aware that these people just care about their own happiness and the happiness of their families, not about us, but we should continue to pray that everything will work out in the end.
